title.rendered: API® Bettafix Freshwater Fish Bacterial Infection Treatment

content.rendered:
Ingredients:
Rabbit with Ground Bone, Olive Oil, Pumpkin Seed, Potassium Chloride, Organic Cranberries, Organic Spinach, Organic Broccoli, Organic Beets, Sodium Phosphate Monobasic, Organic Carrots, Organic Squash, Organic Apples, Organic Blueberries, Choline Chloride, Dried Pediococcus Acidilactici Fermentation Product, Dried Lactobacillus Acidophilus Fermentation Product, Dried Bifidobacterium Longum Fermentation Product, Dried Enterococcus Faecium Fermentation Product, Taurine, Tocopherols (Preservative), Calcium Carbonate, Zinc Proteinate, Zinc Sulfate, Iron Sulfate, Iron Proteinate, Vitamin E Supplement, Niacin, Copper Sulfate, Copper Proteinate, Manganese Sulfate, Sodium Selenite, Manganese Proteinate, Thiamine Mononitrate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Vitamin D3 Supplement, Calcium Iodate

Guaranteed Analysis

Crude protein (min) 30%, Crude fat (min) 15%, Crude fiber (max) 3.5%, Moisture (max) 11%.

excerpt.rendered:
DESCRIPTION
API BETTAFIX Antibacterial & Antifungal Betta Fish Infection and Fungus Remedy in the 1.7-Ounce Bottle helps keep fish healthy in a variety of ways. Use this product to treat infections, heal injuries and wounds, and more.

Features:

Heals bacterial infections, repairing damaged fins, ulcers, and open wounds and promotes regrowth of fins
Treats newly introduced fish to reduce risk of disease outbreak and heal wounds and tissue damage
Contains healing melaleuca, a variety of tea tree
Use daily for a week when treating infections and for three days as a preventive when adding new fish

Includes: Contains one (1) API BETTAFIX Antibacterial & Antifungal Betta Fish Infection and Fungus Remedy 1.7-Ounce Bottle

Intended Pet(s): Fish

Product Dimensions: 3.25 x 1.375 x 6.25

Capacity: 1.7 fl oz

Buy this product on petsmart.com
